title: Worldhotels Partners with one of India’s Largest Luxury Hotel Groups – The Lalit
text:
Worldhotels Partners with one of India’s Largest Luxury Hotel Groups – The Lalit Worldhotels Partners with one of India’s Largest Luxury Hotel Groups – The Lalit Details Category: Hotel   16:45 Worldhotels continues its expansion in the Asia Pacific region with the addition of four affiliates from The Lalit’s portfolio, The Lalit New Delhi, The Lalit Mumbai, The Lalit Ashok Bangalore, and The Lalit Great Eastern Kolkata. One of India’s largest and fastest-growing hotel groups, The Lalit currently operates eleven of India’s leading luxury properties in key destinations. This strategic alliance bolsters Worldhotels’ presence in India, where it now represents a total of nine hotels. . 
India conjures up vivid images of rich culture, classical dance forms, colourful festivities, fascinating arts, and exquisite cuisines, to name only a few. These Lalit hotels – each a top-class destination in its own right – beckon guests to discover the best of India with bespoke experiences and legendary Indian hospitality that complement the local charm and character encapsulated in each property. "We are incredibly honoured to finally bring on board the highly anticipated hotels from one of India’s largest luxury hotel groups - The Lalit. India is emblematic of Worldhotels’ growth momentum in the region, and the arrival of these four extraordinary affiliates of character and charm reinforces our commitment to growing our portfolio in this key market,” states Roland Jegge, Worldhotels’ Executive Vice President Asia Pacific. “With the hotels’ strategic locations, refined elegance and legendary service standards, we look forward to collectively offer guests unsurpassed experiences true to both the destination and the Worldhotels brand ethos.” Related articles
